aboutConfig: Blanket config: The mod only cares about the *value* property, you can edit, delete the others.
aboutConfig2: But if you save the config from the mod, it will override this file.

extraLog.description: The only internal config. Toggle how much log should blanket create

mouseCloseNotHandledFix.description: Fix inventory can not be closed by mouse button.

chatLagFix.description: Fix chat lag on multiplayer servers

lavaDamageDesyncFix.description: Fix lava damaging entities client-side leading to de-sync

entityDamageDesyncFix.description: Fix client damaging items & experience orbs leading to de-sync

guardianBeamRenderFix.description:
Fix guardian beam not rendering due to world time being too high
Sodium-extra has the same fix

sharedEntityIdFix.description: Fix entity id being shared by the client renderer and integrated server

rotatePlayerWithMinecart.description: Rotate the player with the minecart if it turns

optimizedBiomeAccess.description: Optimized the getBiome call to be 25% - 75% faster

crystalsTargetDeadDragonFix.description: Fix end crystals attempting to heal the ender dragon

wolfTailSpinFix.description: Fix wolf tail spinning if health is increased
